key.name: terminal-application
key.description: The Terminal Application used to launch new SSH sessions with.

key.name: terminal-application-arguments
key.description: The arguments passed to the Terminal Application. The command "ssh [-p <port>] [user@]<host>" is appended after the provided arguments.

key.name: ssh-command-single-argument
key.summary: SSH command line is passed as a single argument.
key.description: Whether or not the "ssh [-p <port>] [user@]<host>" command line is appended as a single argument. If not, the command line will be broken up and passed as multiple arguments. Depends on the Terminal Emulator Application used.
